mapper.insert: insert into link(title, url, description, header_img, email, create_time) value (#{title}, #{url}, #{description}, #{headerImg}, #{email}, sysdate())

insert into comment( email, ip, location, os, browser, parent_id, qq_num, nick_name, avatar, page_id, url, display, content, html_content, reply_id, reply, admin_reply, create_by, create_time )values( #{email}, #{ip}, #{location}, #{os}, #{browser}, #{parentId}, #{qqNum}, #{nickName}, #{avatar}, #{pageId}, #{url}, #{display}, #{content}, #{htmlContent}, #{replyId}, #{reply}, #{adminReply}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: select id, title, url, description, header_img from link where delete_time is null and display = 1
select id, title from category where delete_time is null and type = 1 order by create_by, support desc

select b.id, b.title, b.summary, b.header_img_type, b.header_img, b.like, b.click, b.create_time, count(c.id) as comment_count from blog b left join comment c on b.id = c.page_id where b.delete_time is null and c.delete_time is null and b.support = 1 and b.status = 1 group by b.id order by b.create_time, b.weight desc limit 5

select b.id, b.title, b.summary, b.header_img_type, b.header_img, b.like, b.click, b.create_time, count(c.id) as comment_count from blog b left join comment c on b.id = c.page_id where b.delete_time is null and c.delete_time is null group by b.id order by click desc limit 5
select t.id, t.title, t.color, count(tm.id) as count from tag t left join tag_mapping tm on t.id = tm.tag_id where t.delete_time is null group by t.id having count(tm.id) > 0
select id, description, header_img, display, target, url, title, create_time from carousel where delete_time is null
select id, title, type, html_content from notice where delete_time is null

select id, parent_id, nick_name, avatar, page_id, good, admin_reply, bad, reply_id, html_content as content, create_time from comment where delete_time is null and page_id = #{id} order by create_time desc
select title from tag t left join tag_mapping tm on t.id = tm.tag_id where tm.blog_id = #{id}
select id, category_id, title, summary, header_img_type, header_img, html_content, comment, support, `like`, click, create_time, update_time from blog where delete_time is null and id = #{id}
select id, config_key, config_value from config where delete_time is null and config_key = 'about'
select id, nick_name, email, ip, location, os, browser, parent_id, qq_num, avatar, page_id, url, display, good, bad, content, create_by, create_time, reply from comment where id = #{id}
select id, title, url, description, header_img from link where support = 1 order by weight desc
select title from blog where id=#{id}
